sentences.en: But warmer average temperatures are threatening to redraw the wine map.
sentences.cn: 但平均气温逐渐升高,使造酒商们不得不重新规划葡萄酒版图.

sentences.en: Indicates whether the control should redraw itself when resized.
sentences.cn: 指示控件在调整大小时是否应重绘自己.

sentences.en: Redraw the blood tests and get her scheduled for that contrast M. R . I. ASAP.
sentences.cn: 重做血液测试尽快安排她的核磁共振.

sentences.en: Second , to the window under the mouse fat redraw message, it calls system function redraw.
sentences.cn: 向鼠标下的窗口发重画消息, 让它调用系统函数重画.

sentences.en: There is not enough memory to redraw the screen. Save your work and close other programs.
sentences.cn: 内存不足,无法重绘屏幕. 请保存您的工作并关闭其他程序.

sentences.en: They have redrawn the country's boundaries along ethnic lines.
sentences.cn: 他们以种族为界重新勾画了该国的国界。

sentences.en: XHTML is the W 3 C's attempt to redraw lines blurred by browser makers.
sentences.cn: XHTML就是W3C的一次尝试,重新划定由浏览器制造者弄模糊的界限.

trans.tran_en: If people in a position of authority redraw the boundaries or borders of a country or region, they change the borders so that the country or region covers a slightly different area than before
